website_summaries.verdict: Chance are you don't want to dress up as a Christmas gift – unless you are looking for one of the ugliest sweaters available. If so, this is the perfect choice to wow them.
pros: With it's huge bow, holly berries, and bold colors, it's fun and hideous, which makes it ideal for ugly Christmas sweater contests
Material isn't too thin or heavy – nice for layering
cons: Some reported size discrepancies – fit that may run large or small
The neck tends to stretch out

customer_reviews.title: Use Size Chart to get Correct Fit
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to write a review so people would have a better idea on size to select. My husband usually wears a large in sweaters but after reading reviews about how large this sweater runs I bought him the medium for an ugly sweater day at work. It fit him very well. Noticed on the package it says Medium fits chest size 38-40, Large fits a 42-44, and a X-large fits a 46-48. So when going by this size chart the Medium should be his size because he does wear a 40 in a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ugly sweater!
